amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the entire text of the bill and add back the section that creates a non-GMO certification program and label at USDA.
amendment.purpose: Amendment in the nature of a substitute.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pingree amendment (A004) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A004) in the nature of a substitute offered by Ms. Pingree.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) in the nature of a substitute offered by Ms. Pingree.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Pingree amendment (A004) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
